channel.title: Portfolio website for Peter Wan
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio website for Peter Wan

item.title: IMDB
item.description: Analysis of movies- IMDB dataset We will look at a subset sample of movies, taken from the Kaggle IMDB 5000 movie dataset #checking data set using glimpse and skim function movies <- read_csv(here::here("data", "movies.csv")) glimpse(movies) skim(movies) There are no missing values, derived from the skim function, however there are duplicate values, which is logical, as directors may have produced multiple movies or different movies may have received the same IMDB rating.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Peter is a student looking to pursue career opportunities that are both intellectually stimulating and challenging. He just graduated from Cornell University double majoring in Statistical Science and Information Science. He is very interested in the finance industry so he joined London Business School to study masters in financial analysis and expect this experience to transform himself into a professional practitioner. He was fortune to have comprehensive internship experiences in the field such as brokerage, auditing, investment banking, FinTech, and private equity.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
